Sentencas: Ni-Al2O3 composites with varying contents of nickel are synthesized via a glycine nitrate process (GNP) and an impregnation process (IMP).
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Their potential application as an anode functional layer for internal methane CO2 reforming in a solid oxide fuel cell is investigated.
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: H-2-TPR results show that the chemical interaction between NiO and Al2O3 decreases as the nickel content increases.
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Catalytic tests demonstrate that 15 wt.% Ni-Al2O3 catalysts exhibit the best catalytic activity for methane CO2 reforming.
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the carbon formation rates over Ni-Al2O3 prepared via GNP are lower than those over Ni-Al2O3 prepared via IMP using the same amounts of nickel, with the exception of the 1 wt.% Ni-Al2O3 catalyst.
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy and O-2-TPO results indicate that the degree of graphitization and the amount of carbon deposited on the 15 wt.% Ni-Al2O3 catalyst synthesized via GNP are lower than those of the catalyst prepared via IMP following a 60 h stability test.
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A cell with a 15 wt.% Ni-Al2O3 catalyst layer prepared via GNP is fabricated that delivers a peak power density of 1006 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C when operating on methane-CO2 gas mixtures, which is comparable to that observed when operating on hydrogen fuel.
Titulo: Effect of nickel content and preparation method on the performance of Ni-Al2O3 towards the applications in solid oxide fuel cells
